long_description: A mate for your Showers Pass jacket, the Showers Pass hood attaches for wet, windy weather protection. Ripstop nylon fabric features 3-layer waterproof, breathable coating for durable, comfortable protection. Trim-cut hood fits under your helmet for optimal protection. Cinch-cord face seals in warmth and keeps rain out. 3 rip-and-stick tabs properly secure hood to jacket. Fits all Elite, Double Century, Touring and Club jackets.
short_description: A mate for your Showers Pass jacket, the Showers Pass hood attaches for wet, windy weather protection.
